title: Client takes ages to load after game since last patch
body: I have checked "close client during game" and it always worked good, but since last patch 7.10 I have to wait like 2min after every game to see post game stats. What did you broke this time and when will you fix it?

replies.body: Got the exact same thing, it's boring to wait more after games than in queue..

Does unchecking it make it load any faster?  In addition to just pc stress, your network needs to be able to transition you back tot the client from the game server.  Go through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure there's no degradation for a smooth transition.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Ok, unchecking "close client" did the job. It now loads smoothly, but it's still weird how it worked before 7.10 and now it doesn't. And it's not only me having this issue since last patch

I have yet to see if uncheck helps but while the clint is loading after game I have sound, I can hear people leaving lobby, writing in chat, private messages sounds.
My internet is good I think as I can browse youtube smoothly while it loads
